attributes.action: All politicians to pay back money donated to them/their parties by Russians.
attributes.additional_details:
UK government likes to stand up and pretend to be the best in the world at everything whilst not actually doing as much as they could. Nowhere is that more evident than in the current horrific situation in Ukraine.

So get the donations paid back and stop taking dirty money from Russians trying to influence our politics. Enough is enough.
attributes.background: Pay back all money donated by Russians that has supported political activity or bought access to MPs and their services.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about donations to political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.

There are already rules relating to donations to political parties, which you can find out about here: https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/who-we-are-and-what-we-do/financial-reporting/donations-and-loans
